    • Constructor Detail

      • Cli

        public Cli(java.lang.String username,
           RemoteController controllerRmi,
           SocketController controllerSocket,
           boolean single)
        Initializes the Cli
        Parameters:
        username - is the name of the player who is the owner of this view
        controllerRmi - is the server side controller used by this view (if it uses Rmi connection) to contact the model
        controllerSocket - is the client side controller used by this view (if it uses Socket connection) to contact the model
        single - is a boolean used to let Cli understand if it is singleplayer or not

      • onMyFavorTokens

        public void onMyFavorTokens(int value)
        Notify used to update this Cli's owner favor tokens; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        value - is the current number of favor tokens

      • onOtherFavorTokens

        public void onOtherFavorTokens(int value,
                               java.lang.String name)
        Notify used to update this Cli's owner map about other players and their favor tokens; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        value - is the current number of tokens that player
        name - is the name of that player

      • onOtherSchemeCards

        public void onOtherSchemeCards(java.lang.String[][] scheme,
                               java.lang.String name)
        Notify used to update this Cli's owner map about other players and their scheme cards; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        scheme - is the current scheme card of that player
        name - is the name of that player

      • onYourTurn

        public void onYourTurn(boolean yourTurn,
                       java.lang.String reserve,
                       int round,
                       int turn)
        Notify used to update this Cli's owner about the turn management; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        yourTurn - is true if it is the turn of this Cli's owner
        reserve - is the string representing the current reserve state
        round - is the current number of round
        turn - is the current number of turn

        Notify used to update this Cli's owner about the reserve state; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        reserve - is the string representing the current reserve state

        Notify used to update this Cli's owner about the scheme cards proposed to him; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        schemeCards - is the list of strings representing the proposed scheme cards

      • onAfterWindowChoice

        public void onAfterWindowChoice()

      • onInitialization

        public void onInitialization(java.lang.String toolcards,
                             java.lang.String publicCards,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> privateCard,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> players)
        Notify used to update this Cli's owner about the game initialization; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        toolcards - is the string representing this tool cards available in the match
        publicCards - is the string representing this public cards available in the match
        privateCard - is the string representing this this Cli's owner private card in the match
        players - is the list of strings each one representing one opponent

      • onPlayerExit

        public void onPlayerExit(java.lang.String name)
        Notify used to update this Cli's owner about the exit of an opponent; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the opponent who has left the game

      • onPlayerReconnection

        public void onPlayerReconnection(java.lang.String name)
        Notify used to update this Cli's owner about the reconnection of an opponent; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the opponent who has joined the game again

      • onGameClosing

        public void onGameClosing()
        Notify used to tell this Cli's owner if he becomes the only player in game due to disconnection of other players, in this case he is the winner

      • onAfterReconnection

        public void onAfterReconnection(java.lang.String toolcards,
                                java.lang.String publicCards,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> privateCard,
                                java.lang.String reserve,
                                java.lang.String roundTrack,
                                int myTokens,
                                java.lang.String[][] mySchemeCard,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> otherTokens,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[][]> otherSchemeCards,
                                boolean schemeCardChosen,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> toolcardsPrices)
        Notify used to tell this Cli's owner about the state of the match in case of his reconnection; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        toolcards - are the drawn tool cards
        publicCards - are the drawn public cards
        privateCard - is (or are in single player mode) the drawn private card (cards)
        reserve - is the list of dices available for the current round
        roundTrack - is the list of left dices for all round played till the reconnection
        myTokens - is the number of left tokens for you
        mySchemeCard - is your window pattern card at the current state of the match
        otherTokens - are tokens of other players
        otherSchemeCards - are the window pattern cards of the other players
        schemeCardChosen - is true if you've already chosen your scheme card
        toolcardsPrices - is the price of tool cards at this state of the match

      • onGameEnd

        public void onGameEnd(java.lang.String winner,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> rankingNames,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> rankingValues)
        Notify used to tell this Cli's owner that the match is finished; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        winner - is the name of the winner
        rankingNames - is the list of strings representing the names of the opponents
        rankingValues - is the list of integers representing the rankings of the opponents

      • onToolCardUsedByOthers

        public void onToolCardUsedByOthers(java.lang.String name,
                                   int toolCardNumber)
        Notify used to tell this Cli's owner that a tool card has been used for the first time; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of the player who has used the tool card
        toolCardNumber - is the number of the tool card used

      • onGameEndSingle

        public void onGameEndSingle(int goal,
                            int points)
        Notify used to tell this Cli's owner that the match is finished; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
        Parameters:
        goal - is the value that the player has to achieve to win
        points - is the actual ranking of this Cli's owner

      • onChoosePrivateCard

        public void onChoosePrivateCard()
        Notify used to tell this Cli's owner that he has to choose a private card in case of singleplayer match; it is propagated from RmiCli and SocketController
